text: (Lo! those who believe) in Muhammad, Allah, bless him and give him peace, and in the Qur'an (and do good works) they do works of obedience, in that which is between them and their Lord, (their Lord guideth them) makes them enter Paradise (by their faith. Rivers) of wine, water, honey and milk (will flow beneath them) beneath their trees and habitations (in the Gardens of Delight),
